snippet: BERENDSEN--Mildred J. The Browning School notes with sadness the death of Mildred J. Berendsen, trustee from 1988 to 2008, and honorary trustee since 2008. Millie is deeply missed for her commitment, wisdom and sense of optimism. Our thoughts are with her husband Charles. Samuel J. Weinhoff, Board President Stephen M. Clement, III, Headmaster James S. Chanos, Allan L. Gropper, Former Board Presidents and Honorary Trustees 1/3
lead_paragraph: BERENDSEN--Mildred J. The Browning School notes with sadness the death of Mildred J. Berendsen, trustee from 1988 to 2008, and honorary trustee since 2008. Millie is deeply missed for her commitment, wisdom and sense of optimism. Our thoughts are with her husband Charles. Samuel J. Weinhoff, Board President Stephen M. Clement, III, Headmaster James S. Chanos, Allan L. Gropper, Former Board Presidents and Honorary Trustees 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  BERENDSEN, MILDRED J
